resources.string: Please upgrade to enable the widget
*You are covered under Google Play\'s refund policy. \n\nFor ANY reason, if you do not like the app, you are free to refund it as per the Google Play Store refund policy.
When in power saver mode, WIFI/Mobile Internet is turned on and off at intervals in order to save battery and bandwidth. You could leave the default values or choose to customize it below.
Remember to add our desktop widget so you can control WIFI, DATA and setting right from your desktop! \n\nTurn Internet ON every time phone is unlocked?

Power Saver mode is ON during sleep mode. 
WIFI/Data network will remain OFF when the phone is in sleep mode. 

Wifi/Data will be enabled with the phone is in use, based on settings above.

Power Saver mode is OFF during sleep mode. 
WIFI/Data network will occasionally turn ON when the phone is in sleep mode. 

Wifi/Data will be enabled with the phone is in use.
** And get lifetime updates for free **

A lot of time and effort goes into building apps. To avail of all features, please consider upgrading to the PRO version (no ads) for only 99 cents! 

Also get a super cool desktop widget to turn on/off Wifi and Data networks. 
All future upgrades are free.
The advanced version gives you the easy access desktop widget along with all the advanced settings to make your battery last even longer.
If you would like to change the default power saving settings, tap the button below.
Choosing YES (that\'s power saver ON) below will keep Internet/WIFI turned OFF while your phone is in sleep mode.

This app is designed to save battery resources by regulating your WIFI and Mobile Data network usage. 

 You can make your battery last MUCH longer and also save money on any mobile network that you connect to. 

All you need to do is turn ON the power saver by clicking on the button above.

Tap on the button below to customize application related settings. 
Selecting an application from the list will keep Internet ON while that application is in active use. 
 
Eg. If you have selected Facebook from the list, WIFI will continue to run when Facebook is the active (visible) application.
Click here to change app settings

Choose which network you want to use Power Saver Mode in. Especially useful when you are not within WIFI range and want to cut mobile data costs.

Note: Automatic mode will first connect to the available WIFI network.

If WIFI is unavailable, then connect to mobile data.

If you do not use mobile data, please select WIFI only.
Please wait.. setting up the battery saver
Power Saver mode ON during sleep mode
Power Saver mode OFF during sleep mode
